summary: Build a simple romantic interactive single-purpose web page (HTML/CSS/JS) for a birthday surprise with an "Open" button that reveals a letter image/message, optimized to run in Chrome on an iPad with a red/white theme.
known_issues: Deployment failed during assistant attempt to build/deploy the web page.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Romantic envelope illustration, red/white palette (envelope-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Subtle seamless heart pattern background, red on off-white (hearts-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Letter paper texture background, warm white with soft red accents (letter-paper.dim_1400x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-purpose romantic interactive web page that displays only one primary action: a button labeled "Open".
When the user clicks the "Open" button, reveal a letter-style view that shows the exact birthday message text provided by the user.
Apply a romantic red-and-white theme consistently across the page (background, button, typography, and letter presentation) with a coherent visual style suitable for a birthday surprise.
Include required generated static image assets and render them locally from the frontend (do not fetch images from the backend) to support the letter reveal experience.
Resolve the current deployment/build failure and ensure the project can be built and deployed successfully using the standard Internet Computer template workflow.
Ensure the experience is iPad Chrome friendly: responsive layout, large touch targets for the single "Open" button, and no hover-only interactions required to use the app.

When the user clicks the "Open" button, display a letter-style view that includes the exact provided birthday message text (including emojis and line breaks) as the main content of the revealed letter.
Add and use locally-rendered romantic static image assets (no backend image fetching) to support the envelope/letter reveal presentation.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a romantic-themed interactive birthday web page with a single "Open" option/button.
On clicking "Open", display a letter image containing the provided birthday message text.
Apply a red and white romantic color scheme and ensure the page runs easily on iPad Chrome using HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
